summary: Lancelot falls in love with Guinevere, who is due to be married to King Arthur. Meanwhile, a violent warlord tries to seize power from Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table.

keywords: based on legend|love triangle|romantic drama|arthurian legend|king arthur character
title: El primer caballero
